location.region: Xinjiang (신강자치구 / 新疆自治區) - Far West/Northwest.
location.mountain: Mt. Tian (Tian Shan / 天山) - Near the Gobi Desert (Daemak).
location.landmark: Cheonji (Heavenly Lake / 天池) - A giant lake at the summit.
location.geo_political_issue: Often shares the same mountain range as the 'Demonic Cult' (Cheonma-singyo/Ming Cult), causing them to be overshadowed or mistaken for evil.

status.obscurity: Rarely appears in novels because the location is usually reserved for the Demonic Cult's HQ.
status.culture: Distinct from Central Plains (Jungwon). They disregard the hypocritical 'Jianghu morals' of the Orthodox factions.

combat_style.summary: Fast Swords, Bird Mimicry (Movement), and Yin/Ghost Arts.
combat_style.attributes: Ice (Cold / 寒), Sound (Soul / 魂), Speed (Wind / 風).

characteristics.atmosphere: Mysterious, cold, and slightly eerie due to their soul-manipulating arts.

list.name: 삼분검 (Three Part Sword)
list.description: Signature Art. One sword strike appears as three. Emphasizes extreme speed.

list.name: 미혼공 (Confusing Soul Art)
list.effect: Manipulates Yin energy. Draws in vengeful spirits (Wonhon) to build internal power.

list.name: 한음신공 (Cold Yin Divine Art)
list.grade: Supreme (Sect Leader only). The completed form of Mihon-gong.

list.name: 칠금신법 (Seven Birds Body Art)
list.description: Signature Art. Dazzling movements mimicking seven types of birds.

sound_arts.name: 신마소 (God Demon Whistle)
sound_arts.effect: A sound that sounds like ghost cries. Confuses the enemy's mind. Requires 'Mihon-gong'.

narrative_role: The 'Third Force' located in the desolate West.
Neighbors to the Demonic Cult who have survived through grit and strange arts.
Users of 'Soul' and 'Ice' arts, providing a different flavor from standard elemental arts.
A sect that challenges the protagonist's view on 'Righteousness' vs 'Evil' due to their unique methods.
